exceptions.exn: Applied theorem does not have enough premises.

original: intros Df Dg. apply filterdiff_minus. apply filterdiff_comp with (g0 := fun u : prod_NormedModule K V V => minus (fst u) (snd u)) (lf0 := lf) (lg0 := (fun u : prod_NormedModule K V V => minus (lf (fst u)) (lg (snd u)))). - apply filterdiff_ext_loc with (f0 := fun u : U => (f u, g u)) (g0 := (fun u : U => (f u, g u))). + apply filter_true. + intros. split; reflexivity. + apply filterdiff_plus_fct; auto. - apply filterdiff_ext_loc with (f0 := (fun u : prod_NormedModule K V V => minus (fst u) (snd u))) (g0 := (fun u : prod_NormedModule K V V => minus (fst u) (snd u))). + apply filter_true. + apply filterdiff_minus.
